/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. The buildings, painted in hues of red and pink, add a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
